Description: Al Hassan Ghazi Ibrahim Shaker (known as: Shaker) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May 2010. Shaker operates within the Retailing sector focusing on Distributors. It has Companies operating across UAE, Saudi Arabia, Jordan and Lebanon. Shaker is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in April 1994.
